title: Square, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidery on damask taffeta
description: Coat of arms of a Bishop of the Franciscan Order (Cross, crossed arms with stigmata, above a black bird on a mount against a blue ground) with Bishop's hat (green with six tassels) worked on white taffeta within a narrow border of brown and yellow silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Square, 18th century.Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidery on damask taffeta. 1942-55-1.
